title: Should I Take a Taxi?
description: A calculator to help you decide if taking a taxi to save time is worth the money

intro.title: Calculator Introduction
intro.description: This calculator is designed to help users evaluate whether it's worth spending money on a taxi to save commuting time. By calculating your hourly wage value, it helps you decide if the additional fare is justified.

usage.title: Usage
steps: Enter Salary: Input your salary into the calculator.
Enter Fare: Input the estimated taxi fare.
Time Saved: Enter how much time you'll save compared to public transport.

concept.title: Time Value Concept
concept.description: This calculator applies the concept of time as money to help you evaluate the value of taking a taxi. By comparing your hourly wage with the value of saved time, it determines if the extra fare is worth paying.
benefits: Smarter Transport Choices: Make decisions based on actual data.
Time Management Optimization: Choose faster transport options when appropriate.
Avoid Overspending: Opt for economical transport when time value is lower.
concept.conclusion: Use this calculator to make more efficient use of your time and money in transportation choices.
